Articles.Content:
Hello Folks

In order not do fill up my orbits with further comsats i developed a DSN Network Antenna Array Lander/Station for Kerbin for the RemoteTech Relay Network plugin.

General idea behind is something like a copy of the Deep Space Network of planet Earth.

To support missions far away from Kerbin a reliable communication system has to be set up.

This Rocket has an upper stage with 13 sat dishes - 7 of the 500mio. km class and 6 of the 50.000km class and a omnidirectional 5000km antenna as also fuel, retro/landing engine, stabilisation brake/parachute and landing struts.

There are also reserves to add some stuff like Mechjeb and solar panels if you like.

Will probably also work on Mun and Minmus - but not tested right now.

Rocket itself has six liquid boosters jettison three times two after liftoff, a center stage that moves you out of atmosphere and a transfer stage that will orbit and deorbit Kerbin as and probably transfer to Mun and Minmus.

Beside of KSPs Tracking Station i decided to place on of each at 0Ã‚Â° 0' 0 / 46Ã‚Â° 34' 0 E and 0Ã‚Â° 0' 0 / 178Ã‚Â° 55' 0 E

Staging

9 - liftoff

8- boosters 1&2 drop

7 - boosters 3&4 drop

6 - boosters 5&6 drop

5 - center stage drop

4 - fire transfer stage engine

3 - drop transfer stage

2 - fire retro/landing engines

1 - release brake/parachute

0 - (landing struts put in her for manual pre landing activation!)

I love this but am having massive trouble getting it to land safely anywhere do you by chance have the save file or can you make a save with a small DSN network in place, getting satellites in to orbit is not working to well as there needs to be a dsn on the ground

I can see the utility in this.

You don't have to worry about satellites drifting out of range as much.

I don't have the RemoteTech Relay Network plugin yet, but will give it a try when I do.

I love this but am having massive trouble getting it to land safely anywhere do you by chance have the save file or can you make a save with a small DSN network in place, getting satellites in to orbit is not working to well as there needs to be a dsn on the ground

In order to start a DSN network you have to launch comsats, at least a few.

the smartest way is to put three in kerbostationary orbit 2.868,4kmx2868,4km in a perfect triangle formation.

place the first somewhere over the KSC, then placing nr 2 and 3 is easyer.

but you can also put a few more - lets say eight equaly separated - in a 100kmx100km orbit.

next step are the ground stations

i have so much plugins im sure it wont work for you.

but try mechjeb - had no problem to land this with mechjeb.

Hi, I have been using this station and it works well in orbit, but tricky when landing.

It really wants to tumble, but I'm not a great pilot.

I did run into one issue. Not counting the strap on boosters, the second middle stage drains the fuel from the upper landing stage, preventing landing.

I think it was because the engines are so close to the middle stage it confuses the software into thinking those landing engines are part of the second stage.

I replaced the regular decoupler with this longer one and the issue went away.

Also I was thinking in addition to the three at the equator, would two at the North and South Poles be useful when we get multiple planets and deep space missions?

In order to start a DSN network you have to launch comsats, at least a few.

the smartest way is to put three in kerbostationary orbit 2.868,4kmx2868,4km in a perfect triangle formation.

place the first somewhere over the KSC, then placing nr 2 and 3 is easyer.

but you can also put a few more - lets say eight equaly separated - in a 100kmx100km orbit.

next step are the ground stations

i have so much plugins im sure it wont work for you.

but try mechjeb - had no problem to land this with mechjeb.

Cool Thanks I finally got it sorted I got 4 sats in orbit at 5k in veering orbits I then landed the DSN on Minmus and used your idea and made a Hi-Gain power sat thats in a 10k orbit then seems to have line of site for at least 2 sats at anyone time, the Main reason I put the DSN on minmus is for when the mew planets are add AS i Have a small "Explorer" sat that's on course to leave the suns orbit so this will be my version on the Voyager crafts that Nasa has

I must say this add-on has been a fantastic help not I have it working just wish I could get the obits working better lol there more a random placement.
